response.job_title: Tax Partner - Lawyer, Economist, Specialist, and, in October, Master of Taxation.
response.summary: Senior tax lawyer and economist from Universidad de los Andes, with more than seven years of professional experience and six years in taxes. I have worked for recognized Colombian law firms ias a legal advisor. My skills and interests are framed in tax law and practices related to the development of business and transactions.
response.skills: Legal Research, Legal Writing, Legal Advice, Research, Mediation, Tax Advice

profile_positions.description:
- Liderar el área de derecho tributario de la firma.
- Análisis fiscal, planeación fiscal y diseño de alternativas de operaciones de personas jurídicas.
- Elaboración de conceptos dando respuesta a consultas tributarias.
- Preparación de algunas declaraciones de impuestos.
- Elaboración de cálculos tributarios e impactos fiscales en operaciones de M&A, que incluyen la enajenación de activos fijos y acciones.
- Asesoría en la cancelación o sustitución de inversión extranjera en Colombia.
profile_positions.title: Tax Senior Advisor

profile_positions.description:
- Elaboración de conceptos dando respuesta a consultas tributarias.
- Estructuración de negocios, operaciones, fusiones y adquisiciones teniendo en cuenta el impacto fiscal de las transacciones.
- Preparación de declaraciones de impuestos.
- Elaboración de cálculos tributarios relacionados con la enajenación de activos fijos y acciones.
- Asesoría en la cancelación o sustitución de inversión extranjera en Colombia.
- Planeación fiscal de personas naturales.

- La elaboración de cálculos tributarios relacionados con la enajenación de activos fijos y acciones.

company.name: Baviera Legal
company.description:
Baviera Legal is a specialized firm focused in labor law, social security, immigration, and individual taxation, with professionals that come from the most prestigious firms of Colombia and the world. Our firm offers prices that make the difference in the high quality legal services market.

We are different. We want to give our clients added value, providing them an innovative and complete services proposal in every aspect:

- Experience: Because of their extensive experience in the best firms of Colombia and of the World, our team has the knowledge of different sectors. Thus, we know about the challenges of each industry, which we  always take into account when giving alternatives and solutions.


- Technology (“Legal Tech”):  We have artificial-based legal software, that specializes in context analysis of legal documents, with multidisciplinary platforms that incorporate automatic learning.



- Differentiating fees:  We offer high quality, we have fair fees that adapt to small, medium and large size companies.

location.address: Carrera 9 N°115-06/30 Piso 17, Tierra Firme Complex, Bogotá D.C.
